name: safari-ball
effect: Used in battle : Attempts to catch a wild Pokémon, using a catch rate of 1.5×. This item can only be used in the great marsh or kanto safari zone.
short_effect: Tries to catch a wild Pokémon in the Great Marsh or Safari Zone. Success rate is 1.5×.

flavor_text.x_y: A special Poké Ball that is used only in the Great Marsh. It is recognizable by the camouflage pattern decorating it.
